body:
Today i was temp banned for 'being rude to staff', what caused this was me saying something stupid so the staff member jumped to instead of calming me donw and handling the situation well to temp ban me for a day!

What I said was 'no one cares about your warnings', yes it was rude but in my opinion not worthy of a temp ban! Just a small message to all the staff; splease handle the situation well without abusing your power, the chances are the player you just banned regrets what he did and is just as committed to helping the server as you are... ( just a message to all the staff who abuse there power)

replies.body: As you said, you were rude to a staff member. Now he tempbanned you for this. I don't see where the mistake is. And as bpirr said, you were kicked before for the same, as warning. Now it's fact that after you were kicked, you'll get tempbanned if you don't stop. You should know this, if you are playing on this server for more than 2-3 months. If you still think it was a mistake, appeal the infraction via an email to the support. support@avicus.net. You also would know that if you make a forums thread about your ban/tempban your chances will decreased.

'bad actions and behavior', a bad action would be... excessive rudeness... I wasn't excessivly being rude. I was rude 2 times; without using swear words or inappropriate langauge. If I was very rude and constantly yes... a temp ban would possibly be suitable. However I was rude 1 time to a player, without using bad language, and i was rude 1 time to a member of staff in which my opinion really wasn't bad at all... 

So i'll say again, I dont think a temp ban was a suitable punishment
